seo.title: FixPic - Free Online Image Tools | AI Background Removal, Watermark Removal, Compress
seo.description: Free online image tools: AI background removal, watermark removal, fake transparency removal, compression, and resizing. Fast, free, and privacy-safe.

ai-remove-background.title: AI Background Remover - Remove Image Background Automatically | FixPic
ai-remove-background.description: Free AI-powered background removal tool. Automatically detect and remove any background from photos, create transparent PNG images in seconds. No signup required.

remove-watermark.title: AI Watermark Remover - Remove Watermark from Images Free | FixPic
remove-watermark.description: Free AI watermark removal tool. Automatically detect and remove watermarks, logos, and text from images. Clean results in seconds.

remove-fake-transparency.title: Remove Fake Transparency - Fix Checkerboard Background | FixPic
remove-fake-transparency.description: Convert fake transparent backgrounds (gray-white checkerboard) from AI tools like Midjourney, Lovart to real transparent PNG. Free online tool.

compress.title: Image Compressor - Compress PNG, JPG, WebP Online Free | FixPic
compress.description: Free online image compression tool. Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports PNG, JPG, WebP conversion. Fast and easy.

resize.title: Image Resizer - Resize Images Online Free | FixPic
resize.description: Free online image resizer. Change image dimensions precisely with aspect ratio preservation. Supports PNG, JPG, WebP formats.

app.title: FixPic
app.footer: FixPic - AI background removal powered by Replicate, watermark removal powered by Dewatermark.ai

descriptions.aiRemoveBg: AI-powered background removal, automatically detect and remove any background, generate transparent PNG
descriptions.removeWatermark: AI-powered watermark removal, automatically detect and remove watermarks, logos, and text from images
descriptions.removeFakeTransparency: Convert fake transparent backgrounds (gray-white checkerboard) from AI tools like Lovart, Midjourney to real transparent PNG
descriptions.compress: Compress images and convert formats, supports WebP, PNG, JPEG
descriptions.resize: Precisely adjust image dimensions, supports aspect ratio preservation
